user.title: Set up Combined Lights
user.description: Configure light stages that will be controlled by breakpoints and brightness ranges.

data_description.name: A unique name for this controller (e.g., Living Room Combined Lights).
data_description.stage_1_lights: Select all lights for Stage 1 (e.g., ambient lighting).
data_description.stage_2_lights: Select all lights for Stage 2 (e.g., feature lighting).
data_description.stage_3_lights: Select all lights for Stage 3 (e.g., ceiling lighting).
data_description.stage_4_lights: Select all lights for Stage 4 (e.g., task lighting).

advanced.title: Advanced Configuration
advanced.description: Configure breakpoints and brightness ranges for each stage.

data_description.breakpoints: Three values defining slider stages (e.g., [25, 50, 75] for 1-25%, 26-50%, 51-75%, 76-100%).
data_description.brightness_curve: How brightness input translates to stage brightness. Quadratic gives more precision at low brightness levels.
data_description.stage_1_brightness_ranges: Four [min, max] brightness ranges for Stage 1 at each stage.
data_description.stage_2_brightness_ranges: Four [min, max] brightness ranges for Stage 2 at each stage.
data_description.stage_3_brightness_ranges: Four [min, max] brightness ranges for Stage 3 at each stage.
data_description.stage_4_brightness_ranges: Four [min, max] brightness ranges for Stage 4 at each stage.
